deliverables.name: review-collection-workflow.md
deliverables.description: Complete review collection workflow spec - 9 phases covering submission, verification, admin review, publication, moderation. Includes UX flows, validation rules, SLAs, security & compliance (GDPR/CCPA), implementation checklist.
Ready for frontend/backend development. Covers form design, document verification, spam detection, email workflows, admin dashboard, rating aggregation, edge cases, error handling.

deliverables.name: competitor-research.md
deliverables.description: Analysis of Trustpilot, G2, Capterra with MVP recommendations
Key insights: verified reviews only, privacy-first, real estate focus

deliverables.name: reviewsrealty-mvp-features.md
deliverables.description: Complete MVP feature specification - 3 user types, core review system, verification workflow, agent profiles, search, tech stack recommendation
Includes: user flows, success metrics, risk mitigation, 12-week launch timeline. Ready for wireframe/development phase.

deliverables.name: backlink-checker-mvp.html
deliverables.description: Fully functional backlink checker tool - responsive design, instant results, domain analysis with metrics (DA, backlinks, referring domains, trust score, SEO metrics)

Pure HTML/JS MVP ready to deploy. Shows DA, backlinks (est.), referring domains, trust score, link profile summary, SEO metrics, page analysis. Includes simulated data for demo. Ready to integrate with Moz/Semrush API for production.

deliverables.name: backlinku-vs-ahrefs.html
deliverables.description: Complete BacklinkU vs Ahrefs comparison page - feature table, pricing breakdown, decision guide, FAQ, mobile-responsive
SEO-optimized for 'ahrefs alternative', 'cheap backlink checker'. Ready to deploy, highlights 87% cost savings ($19/mo vs $129/mo)

backlinku.name: Set up API for backlink data

deliverables.name: voice-ai-platforms-research.md
deliverables.description: Comprehensive research of 5 top voice AI platforms (ElevenLabs, Play.ht, Descript, Google TTS, Murf.ai) with detailed comparison, pricing breakdown, feature matrix, and dental practice use case analysis

Recommendation: ElevenLabs for Voice AI business targeting dental practices. $82/month cost per practice, $60M TAM. Includes 90-day action plan (research → MVP → go-to-market), technical architecture, competitive analysis, HIPAA compliance strategy, risk mitigation.
